DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate safety V404 PDS patient chronic non-infectious uveitis . Secondarily , study evaluate whether V404 PDS provide clinically measurable benefit extend period time patient chronic non-infectious uveitis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Preliminary Efficacy Study V404 PDS Uveitis
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Confirmed diagnosis active uveitis Sufficient lens/media clarity Meet bestcorrected visual acuity criterion Willing able use contraception Pregnant , breast feeding Uncontrolled glaucoma Intraocular surgery periocular/intraocular injection within 6 week Periocular intraocular steroid within 3 month Prior vitrectomy Prior corneal transplant Prior fluocinolone implant Allergy sensitivity study drug Participation trial within 30 day Abnormal liver function History positive serum tuberculosis test
